abstract: Broadway performer Kerry Butler loves her penthouse duplex on Upper West Side, where she lives with her husband and two daughters with midcentury modern furniture and extravagance of high-end Japanese toilet.

headline.print_headline: An Excellent Stand-In for a House
headline.main: Kerry Butler on Japanese Toilets and ‘Disaster!’

snippet: The actress lives with her husband, Joey Mazzarino, and their children on the Upper West Side.
lead_paragraph: The actress lives with her husband, Joey Mazzarino, and their children on the Upper West Side.
